nodes.text: The HS-14 hoverskiff was a model of skiff that was developed by the SoroSuub Corporation for use as a cargo hauler. They were versatile and saw use on various backwater worlds, particulary on farms and in rural areas. A number saw service with the Corporate Sector Authority and in 19 ABY, the CSA deployed several HS-14 hoverskiffs on the streets of the city Tel Bollin, on the quarantined planet Endregaad.
